text: Kaho, “aey ehle kitab! Aao ek aisi baat ki taraf jo hamare aur tumhare darmiyan yaksaan hai , yeh ke hum Allah ke siwa kisi ki bandagi na karein, uske saath kisi ko shareek na thehrayein , aur hum mein se koi Allah ke siwa kisi ko apna Rubb na bana ley”. Is dawat ko qabool karne se agar woh mooh moadein to saaf kehdo ke gawah raho, hum to Muslim (sirf khuda ki bandagi o itaat karne waley) hain
